Headline: #67 67th-69th-71st Temporary Reroute at 67th/Woodlawn.
ShortDescription: #67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Cottage Grove, Marquette, Stony Island.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#67 67th-69th-71st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 67th, Cottage Grove, Marquette, Stony Island then resume their normal route on 67th, due to fire department activity near 67th/Woodlawn.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard- bound Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Howard- bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Sox-35th Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard- bound Red Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier mechanical problem at Sox-35th

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
